title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 84 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 84 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O LORD of hosts!
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗，交与伶长，用迦特乐器）万军之耶和华阿，你的居所何等可爱。

lineList.en: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.
lineList.cn: 我羡慕渴想耶和华的院宇。我的心肠，我的肉体，向永生神呼吁（或作欢呼）。

lineList.en: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, even thine altars, O LORD of hosts, my King, and my God.
lineList.cn: 万军之耶和华我的王，我的神阿，在你祭坛那里，麻雀为自己找着房屋。燕子为自己找着抱雏之窝。

lineList.en: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.
lineList.cn: 如此住在你殿中的，便为有福。他们仍要赞美你。（细拉）

lineList.en: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
lineList.cn: 靠你有力量心中想往锡安大道的，这人便为有福。

lineList.en: Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.
lineList.cn: 他们经过流泪谷，叫这谷变为泉源之地。并有秋雨之福，盖满了全谷。

lineList.en: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.
lineList.cn: 他们行走，力上加力，各人到锡安朝见神。

lineList.en: O LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.
lineList.cn: 耶和华万军之神阿，求你听我的祷告。雅各的神阿，求你留心听。（细拉）

lineList.en: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你是我们的盾牌。求你垂顾观看你受膏者的面。

lineList.en: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
lineList.cn: 在你院宇住一日，胜似在别处住千日。宁可在我神殿中看门，不愿住在恶人的帐棚里。

lineList.en: For the LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华神是日头，是盾牌，要赐下恩惠和荣耀。他未尝留下一样好处，不给那些行动正直的人。

lineList.en: O LORD of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
lineList.cn: 万军之耶和华阿，倚靠你的人，便为有福。
